blog.name: sandssavvy
blog.title: Where fandoms collide
blog.description:
I am a giant geek so there will be a lot of fandom posts. However I will also reblog a lot of current events, social justice, etc. I also have some old rp blogs. I am white, dyadic, genderfluid (she or they pronouns), and asexual biromantic. I intend for this blog to be queer positive, trans positive, anti-racism, and intersectionally feminist.

Please let me know if you need any specific trigger warnings if you follow me. I try to trigger warn for any content about rape with "rape culture", "rape", or "tw:rape" also I tag "gifs" or "Gif set" for anyone with epilepsy

My Archive of Our Own fanfic page.

My youtube account

It is mainly full of Critical Role compilation vids and cosplay vids.

and my Ko-fi is here.

In case you would like to support me.

Tumblr posts of my vids are here

summary: Everyone tries out Nila's "stink pouch" to mixed results. Nila's little bag of treasures will never have a dignified name again....
caption:
Everyone tries out Nila’s “stink pouch” to mixed results.
Nila’s little bag of treasures will never have a dignified name again.

Footage from Critical Role Campaign 2 Episode 27: “Converging Fury”

Subscribe if you want to see more of my Critical Role compilation vids as they are released.

summary: Doing a rewatch of Campaign 1 and realized Taliesin was also the first of Vox Machina to die with no cleric present and make...
body:
Doing a rewatch of Campaign 1 and realized Taliesin was also the first of Vox Machina to die with no cleric present and make everyone wait a week to see the resolution of it.

ETA: It’s Ep 68 & 69 for reference.

reblog.comment:
Doing a rewatch of Campaign 1 and realized Taliesin was also the first of Vox Machina to die with no cleric present and make everyone wait a week to see the resolution of it.

ETA: It’s Ep 68 & 69 for reference.

trail.content_raw:
Doing a rewatch of Campaign 1 and realized Taliesin was also the first of Vox Machina to die with no cleric present and make everyone wait a week to see the resolution of it.

ETA: It’s Ep 68 & 69 for reference.

summary: Finally watched the second half of episode 27 - my only current mood is keeping track of how many in-game days have passed since...

I love Nila though! And Keg keeps growing on me!

blog.name: is-mollymauk-alive-yet
blog.title: Is Mollymauk Alive Yet
blog.description: This used to be a cosplay page until Mollymauk Died. Ps: I don't tag spoilers unless they were previously tagged so please be aware.

summary:
As a tribute to Mollymauk, im naming my teifling after him and when people ask her what her names mean, she'll say: 

"Good...
caption: As a tribute to Mollymauk, im naming my teifling after him and when people ask her what her names mean, she’ll say: “Good Person. Good and now happy person. Hero. Friend. And brother.” Im will never get over his death.

reblog.comment: As a tribute to Mollymauk, im naming my teifling after him and when people ask her what her names mean, she’ll say: “Good Person. Good and now happy person. Hero. Friend. And brother.” Im will never get over his death.

trail.content_raw: As a tribute to Mollymauk, im naming my teifling after him and when people ask her what her names mean, she’ll say: “Good Person. Good and now happy person. Hero. Friend. And brother.” Im will never get over his death.
trail.content: As a tribute to Mollymauk, im naming my teifling after him and when people ask her what her names mean, she’ll say: “Good Person. Good and now happy person. Hero. Friend. And brother.” Im will never get over his death.
